metadata.titleEn: High temporal and spatial resolution precipitation data of Upper Brahmaputra River Basin (1981-2019)
metadata.titleCn: 雅鲁藏布江流域高时空分辨率降水数据（1981-2019）
metadata.description:
This data set is the version 2 of "High temporal and spatial resolution precipitation data of Upper Brahmaputra River Basin (1981-2016) ", with additional data from 2017 to 2019.
This data set describes the temporal and spatial distribution of precipitation in the Upper Brahmaputra River Basin. We integrate (CMA, GLDAS, ITP-Forcing, MERRA2, TRMM) five sets of reanalysis precipitation products and satellite precipitation products, and combine the observation precipitation of 9 national meteorological stations from China Meteorological Administration (CMA) and 166 rain gauges of the Ministry of Water Resources (MWR) in the basin. The time range is 1981-2019, the time resolution is 3 hours, the spatial resolution is 5 km, and the unit is mm/h. The data will provide better data support for the study of Upper Brahmaputra River Basin, and can be used to study the response of hydrological process to climate change. Please refer to the instruction document uploaded with the data for specific usage information.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集是“雅鲁藏布江流域高时空分辨率降水数据（1981-2016）”的第二版，在原有基础上增加了2017-2019年的数据。
该数据集描述了雅鲁藏布江流域的降水时空分布，融合了 CMA、GLDAS、ITP-Forcing、MERRA2、TRMM五套再分析降水产品和卫星降水产品， 并结合流域内9个国家气象站和166个水利部雨量筒的观测降水制作而成，时间范围为1981-2019年，时间分辨率为3 h，空间分辨率为5 km，单位是mm/h。该数据将为雅江流域的研究提供更好的数据支撑，可用于研究流域水文过程对气候变化的响应等领域。具体使用信息请看随数据一同上传的说明文档。
metadata.instructions:
For the convenience of users, the data is stored in the format of TXT, one file per month. The name is "prec_integrated_yyyymm.txt", where yyyy represents the year and mm represents the month. Each file is internally stored with 248 (January, March, May, July, August, October, December), 240 (April, June, September, November), 224 or 232 (February) precipitation spatial distribution. The number of rows and columns of each distribution is 292 * 79, arranged in time sequence (0, 3, 6, 9...o'clock). Add the header file information to each image to open it with ArcGIS. The header file information is as follows:
ncols 292
nrows 79
xllcorner 20968.258085928
yllcorner 3078203.0630637
cellsize 5000
NODATA_value -9999

background: Precipitation in the basin is mainly controlled by the Indian summer monsoon and westerly and is the key to understanding the water resources available in the basin; however, due to sparse observational data constrained by a harsh environment and complex topography, there remains a lack of reliable information on basin-wide precipitation (there are only nine national meteorological stations with continuous observations). The Tibetan Plateau (TP), known as the highest plateau in the world, is covered by massive glaciers, snow, and permafrost, which significantly affect the hydrological processes of all the large rivers that are fed by it: the Brahmaputra, the Salween, and the Mekong, among others. However, due to the irregular and sparse distribution of national meteorological stations, particularly in the upper Brahmaputra (precipitation data from only nine stations are available and are sparsely distributed), there are large data constraints on research on these hydrological processes and their responses to climate change. Although there are many more rain gauges managed by the Ministry of Water Resources (MWR), most of them are located in middle-stream regions, and rainfall datasets are only recorded over short time periods. Accurate spatial distributions of precipitation are unavailable. Most studies have focused on evapotranspiration, soil moisture, and groundwater products derived from GLDAS or MERRA2; meanwhile, to the best of our knowledge, there has been less focus on the evaluation of methods of precipitation estimation and little work on the corresponding river discharge simulations within the upper Brahmaputra River basin. These precipitation products generally have the advantage of wide and consistent coverage and have shown great potential in many applications but also suffer from large uncertainties over the upper Brahmaputra River basin due to indirect observations, insufficient gauge calibration, and complex topography.
research objective: In this study, we focus on integrating gauge, satellite, and reanalysis precipitation datasets to generate a new dataset over the upper Brahmaputra, suitable for use in hydrological simulations and other scientific research related to climate change.
challenges: Furthermore, no products used in this study accurately represent extreme precipitation events; thus, it is necessary to improve the ability of all of these products to capture extreme events.
methods: To improve the accuracy of basin-wide precipitation data, we integrate various gauge, satellite, and reanalysis precipitation datasets, including GLDAS, ITP-Forcing, MERRA2, TRMM, and CMA datasets, to develop a new precipitation product for the 1981–2016 period over the upper Brahmaputra River basin, at 3 h and 5 km resolution. The new product has been rigorously validated at different temporal scales (e.g., extreme events, daily to monthly variability, and long-term trends) and spatial scales (point and basin scale) with gauge precipitation observations.
dataset: The new precipitation product has been rigorously validated at different temporal scales (e.g., extreme events, daily to monthly variability, and long-term trends) and spatial scales (point and basin scale) with gauge precipitation observations, showing much improved accuracies compared to previous products.
findings: An improved hydrological simulation has been achieved (low relative bias: −5.94 %; highest Nash–Sutcliffe coefficient of efficiency (NSE): 0.643) with the new precipitation inputs, showing reliability and potential for multidisciplinary studies.
backgroundCn: 流域内的降水主要受印度夏季季风和西风的影响，这是理解流域水资源的关键。然而，由于受限于恶劣的环境和复杂的地形，观测数据稀少，流域范围内的降水信息仍然缺乏可靠性（目前只有九个国家气象站提供连续观测数据）。青藏高原（TP）被称为世界最高的高原，覆盖着大量的冰川、雪和永久冻土，这对所有由其供水的大河的水文过程产生了显著影响，包括布拉马普特拉河、萨尔温河和湄公河等。然而，由于国家气象站的不规则和稀疏分布，特别是在上游布拉马普特拉河流域（仅有九个气象站提供降水数据且分布稀疏），对这些水文过程及其对气候变化响应的研究存在较大数据限制。尽管水资源部（MWR）管理着更多的雨量计，但大多数位于中游地区，降水数据仅在短时间内记录，准确的降水空间分布尚不可用。大多数研究集中在蒸散发、土壤湿度和从GLDAS或MERRA2衍生的地下水产品上；与此同时，据我们所知，关于降水估算方法的评估以及上游布拉马普特拉河流域相应的河流流量模拟的研究较少。这些降水产品通常具有广泛和一致的覆盖范围，并在许多应用中显示出巨大潜力，但由于间接观测、气象站校准不足和复杂的地形，导致在上游布拉马普特拉河流域存在较大的不确定性。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，我们专注于整合测站、卫星和再分析降水数据集，以生成一个适用于上布拉马普特拉河流域的新的数据集，适合用于水文模拟和与气候变化相关的其他科学研究。
challengesCn: 此外，本研究中使用的产品都无法准确代表极端降水事件，因此有必要提高所有这些产品捕捉极端事件的能力。
methodsCn: 为了提高流域范围内降水数据的准确性，我们整合了多种雨量计、卫星和再分析降水数据集，包括GLDAS、ITP-Forcing、MERRA2、TRMM和CMA数据集，开发了一个新的降水产品，覆盖1981年至2016年期间的上布拉马普特拉河流域，分辨率为3小时和5公里。该新产品在不同的时间尺度（例如极端事件、日常到月度变异性和长期趋势）和空间尺度（点和流域尺度）上与雨量计降水观测进行了严格验证。
datasetCn: 新的降水产品在不同的时间尺度（例如极端事件、日常到月度变异性和长期趋势）和空间尺度（点尺度和流域尺度）上进行了严格验证，与雨量观测数据相比，显示出比以前的产品更高的准确性。
findingsCn: 通过新的降水输入，已实现了改进的水文模拟（相对偏差低：−5.94%；最高纳什–沙普利系数（NSE）：0.643），显示出可靠性和在多学科研究中的潜力。

Verification.QuestionEn: Can the new precipitation product be validated at both temporal and spatial scales with gauge observations?
Verification.QuestionCn: 新的降水产品能否通过雨量观测在时间和空间尺度上进行验证？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What methods are used to integrate gauge, satellite, and reanalysis precipitation datasets for generating a new dataset suitable for hydrological simulations?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 用于整合测站、卫星和再分析降水数据集的方法，以生成适合水文模拟的新数据集有哪些？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the main data constraints in researching hydrological processes and their responses to climate change in the upper Brahmaputra River basin?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在研究上游布rahmaputra河流域的水文过程及其对气候变化的响应时，主要的数据限制在哪里？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Irregular and sparse distribution of national meteorological stations
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 国家气象站分布不均且稀疏

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Who provides the observational data that is critical for validating new precipitation products in the Brahmaputra basin?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 谁提供了对验证布拉马普特拉流域新降水产品至关重要的观测数据？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of how a combination of gauge, satellite, and reanalysis datasets can improve the accuracy of precipitation data collection in regions with sparse observational coverage?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个例子，说明如何结合测量仪、卫星和再分析数据集可以提高在观测覆盖稀疏地区降水数据收集的准确性？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of this approach is the integration of various datasets like GLDAS, ITP-Forcing, MERRA2, TRMM, and CMA to develop a new precipitation product for the upper Brahmaputra River basin. This method improved the spatial and temporal resolution of precipitation data by combining different sources, leading to more accurate hydrological simulations.
Example.AnswerCn: 这种方法的一个例子是整合GLDAS、ITP-Forcing、MERRA2、TRMM和CMA等多个数据集，以开发一个新的布拉马普特拉河上游的降水产品。这种方法通过结合不同来源的数据，提高了降水数据的空间和时间分辨率，从而导致更准确的水文模拟。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge encountered when estimating precipitation in regions with complex topography, and how can it be addressed?
Example.QuestionCn: 在具有复杂地形的地区估算降水量时遇到的一个挑战是什么，以及如何解决这个问题？
Example.AnswerEn: A significant challenge is the large uncertainties in precipitation estimates due to indirect observations and insufficient gauge calibration, particularly in regions like the upper Brahmaputra River basin. This can be addressed by integrating multiple datasets and rigorously validating the new precipitation product at different temporal and spatial scales with gauge observations.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个重大挑战是由于间接观测和不足的雨量计校准，导致降水估计存在较大不确定性，特别是在像布拉马普特拉河上游流域这样的地区。可以通过整合多个数据集，并在不同的时间和空间尺度上与雨量观测进行严格验证，来解决这个问题。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of how improved precipitation datasets can enhance hydrological simulations and research related to climate change?
Example.QuestionCn: 改进的降水数据集如何能够增强与气候变化相关的水文模拟和研究的一个例子？
Example.AnswerEn: With the new precipitation inputs developed by integrating multiple datasets, improved hydrological simulations were achieved, showing a low relative bias of −5.94% and the highest Nash–Sutcliffe coefficient of efficiency (NSE) of 0.643. This demonstrates the potential for these datasets to enhance research on hydrological processes and their responses to climate change.
Example.AnswerCn: 通过整合多个数据集开发的新降水输入，实现了改进的水文模拟，显示出相对偏差为−5.94%，最高纳什–沙普利夫效率系数（NSE）为0.643。这表明这些数据集在增强水文过程及其对气候变化响应的研究方面具有潜力。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the features and characteristics that define a high spatial and temporal resolution precipitation dataset in the Yarlung Zangbo River Basin?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 定义雅鲁藏布江流域高空间和时间分辨率降水数据集的特征和特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 3-hour temporal resolution, 5 km spatial resolution, integrates data from CMA, GLDAS, ITP-Forcing, MERRA2, TRMM, includes observations from national meteorological stations, includes observations from Ministry of Water Resources rain gauges
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 3小时时间分辨率，5公里空间分辨率，整合来自CMA、GLDAS、ITP-Forcing、MERRA2、TRMM的数据，包括国家气象站的观测数据，包括水利部雨量计的观测数据。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the time resolution of the integrated precipitation datasets used in this field?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在该领域使用的综合降水数据集的时间分辨率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many national meteorological stations are utilized for observational data in the basin?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在该流域中，利用多少个国家气象站进行观测数据？

Quantification.QuestionEn: Over how many years does the high spatiotemporal resolution precipitation dataset extend?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 高时空分辨率降水数据集的时间跨度为多少年？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of 'validation at different temporal scales' in the context of developing new precipitation products?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在开发新的降水产品的背景下，“在不同时间尺度上的验证”的重要性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Validation at different temporal scales involves assessing the accuracy of a precipitation dataset by comparing it with observed data over various time intervals, such as extreme events, daily, monthly, and long-term trends, to ensure its reliability for modeling and research purposes.
Definition.AnswerCn: 不同时间尺度的验证涉及通过将降水数据集与观测数据在极端事件、日常、月度和长期趋势等不同时间间隔进行比较，以评估其准确性，从而确保其在建模和研究中的可靠性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the integrated gauge, satellite, and reanalysis precipitation datasets compare to traditional gauge-only datasets in terms of capturing extreme precipitation events in the Brahmaputra River basin?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 集成的雨量计、卫星和再分析降水数据集在捕捉布拉马普特拉河流域的极端降水事件方面，与传统的仅基于雨量计的数据集相比，表现如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The integrated datasets improve the accuracy of capturing basin-wide precipitation, but none accurately represent extreme precipitation events. The integration of various datasets aims to improve these representations, unlike gauge-only datasets which suffer from sparse distribution and short recording periods.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 集成的数据集提高了对流域范围内降水的捕捉准确性，但没有一个能够准确表示极端降水事件。各种数据集的集成旨在改善这些表示，而仅依赖雨量计的数据集则因分布稀疏和记录时间短而受到限制。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data accuracy between the new precipitation product and previous precipitation products in the context of hydrological simulation for the Brahmaputra River basin?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在布拉马普特拉河流域的水文模拟中，新降水产品与以前的降水产品在数据准确性方面有什么区别？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The new precipitation product demonstrates much improved accuracies compared to previous products. It shows low relative bias and a higher Nash–Sutcliffe coefficient of efficiency (NSE), indicating improved reliability in hydrological simulations.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 新的降水产品相比于之前的产品显示出显著的准确性提升。它具有较低的相对偏差和更高的纳什–沙普利系数（NSE），表明在水文模拟中的可靠性得到了改善。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can the integration of gauge, satellite, and reanalysis precipitation datasets reveal about the spatial and temporal distribution of precipitation in complex topographical areas?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 综合使用测量、卫星和再分析降水数据集可以揭示复杂地形区域降水的空间和时间分布情况吗？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of these datasets can reveal more accurate spatial and temporal distributions of precipitation, overcoming data constraints caused by sparse observational data and complex topography. This integration helps in generating a new dataset suitable for hydrological simulations and climate change research.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 这些数据集的整合可以揭示更准确的降水空间和时间分布，克服由于观测数据稀疏和复杂地形造成的数据限制。这种整合有助于生成适合水文模拟和气候变化研究的新数据集。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the challenges in accurately representing extreme precipitation events affect the interpretation of hydrological simulations in the upper Brahmaputra River basin?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在准确表示极端降水事件的挑战如何影响对雅鲁藏布江上游流域水文模拟的解读？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The challenges in representing extreme precipitation events may lead to uncertainties in hydrological simulations, affecting the reliability of conclusions drawn about water resource availability and hydrological responses to climate change in the basin. Improving the capture of extreme events is necessary for more reliable simulations.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在表示极端降水事件时所面临的挑战可能导致水文模拟中的不确定性，从而影响关于流域水资源可用性和气候变化对水文响应的结论的可靠性。提高对极端事件的捕捉能力对于更可靠的模拟是必要的。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What implications do the improved accuracies of precipitation products have for future research on climate change impacts in the Brahmaputra River basin?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 降水产品准确性的提高对未来在布拉马普特拉河流域气候变化影响研究的影响是什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The improved accuracies of precipitation products imply that future research can achieve more reliable hydrological simulations and analyses of climate change impacts. This enhanced data accuracy supports multidisciplinary studies, providing a stronger foundation for understanding climate-related changes in the region.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 降水产品的准确性提高意味着未来的研究可以实现更可靠的水文模拟和气候变化影响分析。这种增强的数据准确性支持多学科研究，为理解该地区气候相关变化提供了更坚实的基础。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in accurately representing extreme precipitation events in datasets related to the upper Brahmaputra River basin?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在与上布rahmaputra河流域相关的数据集中，准确表示极端降水事件的挑战因素包括哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Extreme precipitation events are not accurately represented due to indirect observations, insufficient gauge calibration, and complex topography, which contribute to large uncertainties in the datasets.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 极端降水事件由于间接观测、测量仪器校准不足和复杂的地形，导致数据集存在较大的不确定性，因此未能得到准确的表示。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there a lack of reliable information on basin-wide precipitation in the upper Brahmaputra River basin?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在雅鲁藏布江上游流域缺乏可靠的流域降水信息？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The lack of reliable information is caused by sparse observational data constrained by a harsh environment and complex topography, and the irregular and sparse distribution of national meteorological stations, particularly in the upper Brahmaputra.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 缺乏可靠信息的原因是观测数据稀少，受限于恶劣的环境和复杂的地形，以及国家气象站的不规则和稀疏分布，特别是在上布拉马普特拉河流域。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the outcomes of integrating multiple sources such as gauge, satellite, and reanalysis precipitation datasets for data collection in the upper Brahmaputra River basin?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合多个来源的降水数据集，如雨量计、卫星和再分析数据集，在上布rahmaputra河流域的数据收集中的结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating multiple sources results in a new dataset suitable for hydrological simulations and scientific research related to climate change, with improved spatial and temporal accuracy, especially in extreme events and long-term trends.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合多个来源的数据生成了一个新的数据集，适用于与气候变化相关的水文模拟和科学研究，特别是在极端事件和长期趋势方面，具有更高的空间和时间精度。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of sparse observational data and complex topography on precipitation data accuracy in the Tibetan Plateau region?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 稀疏的观测数据和复杂的地形对青藏高原地区降水数据准确性的潜在影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Sparse observational data and complex topography lead to large uncertainties in precipitation data due to indirect observations and insufficient gauge calibration, affecting the reliability of hydrological process research and climate change response studies.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 稀疏的观测数据和复杂的地形导致降水数据存在较大不确定性，这主要是由于间接观测和不足的雨量计校准，影响了水文过程研究和气候变化响应研究的可靠性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives of integrating multiple gauge, satellite, and reanalysis precipitation datasets for data collection in the Brahmaputra River basin?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 整合多个雨量计、卫星和再分析降水数据集在布拉马普特拉河流域的数据收集的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to generate a new dataset over the upper Brahmaputra that is suitable for use in hydrological simulations and other scientific research related to climate change, by improving the accuracy of basin-wide precipitation data.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是生成一个新的数据集，涵盖上布rahmaputra河，适用于水文模拟和与气候变化相关的其他科学研究，通过提高流域范围内降水数据的准确性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to address the challenges of capturing extreme precipitation events in the creation of a dataset?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在创建数据集时，解决捕捉极端降水事件的挑战是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: It is important because no current products accurately represent extreme precipitation events, which is necessary to improve the ability of all products to capture these events for better hydrological simulations and climate research.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 这很重要，因为目前没有任何产品能够准确表示极端降水事件，而这对于提高所有产品捕捉这些事件的能力，以便更好地进行水文模拟和气候研究是必要的。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can different precipitation datasets be integrated to improve the accuracy of hydrological simulations in regions with sparse observational data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何整合不同的降水数据集，以提高在观测数据稀缺地区水文模拟的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To improve the accuracy of basin-wide precipitation data, various gauge, satellite, and reanalysis precipitation datasets, including GLDAS, ITP-Forcing, MERRA2, TRMM, and CMA datasets, can be integrated. This approach has been validated at different temporal and spatial scales with gauge precipitation observations to ensure improved accuracy over previous products.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了提高流域范围内降水数据的准确性，可以整合各种雨量计、卫星和再分析降水数据集，包括GLDAS、ITP-Forcing、MERRA2、TRMM和CMA数据集。该方法已在不同的时间和空间尺度上通过雨量计降水观测进行了验证，以确保其准确性优于以前的产品。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedural steps required to validate a new precipitation dataset over a complex topographic region?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在复杂地形区域验证新的降水数据集所需的程序步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The validation of a new precipitation dataset involves rigorous assessment at different temporal scales, such as extreme events, daily to monthly variability, and long-term trends, as well as at different spatial scales, including point and basin scale validations with gauge precipitation observations.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 新降水数据集的验证涉及在不同时间尺度（如极端事件、日到月的变异性和长期趋势）以及不同空间尺度（包括与雨量观测站的点和流域尺度验证）进行严格评估。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodological approaches can be employed to address the challenge of accurately capturing extreme precipitation events in a complex topographic basin?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以采用哪些方法论方法来应对在复杂地形流域中准确捕捉极端降水事件的挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To address the challenge of accurately capturing extreme precipitation events, it is necessary to enhance the capability of integrated precipitation products by improving the calibration and validation processes, using a combination of gauge, satellite, and reanalysis datasets to better represent these events.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了解决准确捕捉极端降水事件的挑战，有必要通过改进校准和验证过程来增强综合降水产品的能力，利用雨量计、卫星和再分析数据集的组合，更好地表示这些事件。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods enable the integration of various gauge, satellite, and reanalysis datasets to improve the accuracy of precipitation data in complex topographies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法可以整合各种测站、卫星和再分析数据集，以提高复杂地形中降水数据的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration involves using GLDAS, ITP-Forcing, MERRA2, TRMM, and CMA datasets to develop a new precipitation product, validated against gauge observations at different temporal and spatial scales.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 该集成涉及使用GLDAS、ITP-Forcing、MERRA2、TRMM和CMA数据集开发一种新的降水产品，并在不同的时间和空间尺度上与雨量观测进行验证。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What are the necessary conditions for improving precipitation datasets to accurately represent extreme precipitation events in hydrological research?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 改善降水数据集以准确表示水文研究中的极端降水事件所需的必要条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Improving the ability of products to capture extreme events is necessary, as current datasets do not accurately represent them, indicating a need for enhanced methods and validation processes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 提高产品捕捉极端事件的能力是必要的，因为当前的数据集并未准确反映这些事件，这表明需要改进方法和验证过程。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might existing datasets struggle to accurately represent precipitation distribution across the upper Brahmaputra River basin?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 现有数据集可能难以准确表示雅鲁藏布江上游流域的降水分布的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Existing datasets may struggle due to the sparse distribution of national meteorological stations, particularly in the upper Brahmaputra, and the limitations of rain gauges which are often located in middle-stream regions. Additionally, indirect observations, insufficient gauge calibration, and complex topography contribute to large uncertainties in these datasets.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 现有的数据集可能由于国家气象站的稀疏分布，特别是在上游的布rahmaputra河流域，以及雨量计通常位于中游地区的局限性而面临困难。此外，间接观测、仪器校准不足和复杂的地形也导致这些数据集存在较大的不确定性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What expectations should researchers have when integrating multiple precipitation datasets to improve hydrological simulations?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 研究人员在整合多个降水数据集以改善水文模拟时应有哪些期望？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Researchers should expect that integrating various gauge, satellite, and reanalysis precipitation datasets can significantly improve the accuracy of precipitation data. This integration could result in better hydrological simulations, as demonstrated by low relative bias and improved Nash–Sutcliffe coefficient of efficiency, indicating reliability and potential for multidisciplinary studies.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 研究人员应该预期，整合各种测量、卫星和再分析降水数据集可以显著提高降水数据的准确性。这种整合可能会导致更好的水文模拟，正如低相对偏差和改进的纳什–沙普利夫效率系数所示，表明其可靠性和在多学科研究中的潜力。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might it be challenging to capture extreme precipitation events accurately in existing precipitation products?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在现有降水产品中，准确捕捉极端降水事件可能面临挑战的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Capturing extreme precipitation events accurately is challenging due to the limitations of current products that do not accurately represent these events. This suggests a need for further improvement in the ability of these products to capture extreme events, likely due to indirect observations and insufficient calibration of available datasets.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 准确捕捉极端降水事件是一个挑战，因为当前的产品无法准确表示这些事件。这表明这些产品在捕捉极端事件的能力上需要进一步改进，这可能是由于间接观测和现有数据集的校准不足所致。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of integrating various precipitation datasets in overcoming the challenges of sparse observational data in complex topographies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估整合各种降水数据集在克服复杂地形中稀疏观测数据挑战的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The integration of various precipitation datasets, such as gauge, satellite, and reanalysis datasets, effectively addresses the challenges posed by sparse observational data and complex topography. It improves the accuracy of basin-wide precipitation data, which is crucial for reliable hydrological simulations and research on climate change impacts.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 各种降水数据集的整合，如雨量计、卫星和再分析数据集，有效地解决了稀疏观测数据和复杂地形带来的挑战。它提高了流域范围内降水数据的准确性，这对可靠的水文模拟和气候变化影响研究至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the primary limitations of current precipitation datasets for capturing extreme weather events in the Brahmaputra River basin?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在我看来，目前降水数据集在捕捉布拉马普特拉河流域极端天气事件方面的主要局限性是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Current precipitation datasets have limitations in accurately representing extreme precipitation events due to indirect observations, insufficient gauge calibration, and the complex topography of the Brahmaputra River basin. Improving the ability of these products to capture extreme events is necessary for more accurate hydrological simulations.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 当前的降水数据集在准确表示极端降水事件方面存在局限性，原因包括间接观测、雨量计校准不足以及布拉马普特拉河流域复杂的地形。提高这些产品捕捉极端事件的能力对于更准确的水文模拟是必要的。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: Can the integration of multiple datasets be considered a reliable method for improving hydrological simulations and how does it compare to previous methods?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 多个数据集的集成是否可以被视为提高水文模拟的可靠方法，以及它与以前的方法相比如何？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Yes, the integration of multiple datasets is a reliable method for improving hydrological simulations, as it shows much improved accuracies compared to previous products. This method has been validated at different temporal and spatial scales, leading to better simulation results with lower relative bias and higher efficiency coefficients.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 是的，多个数据集的集成是一种可靠的方法，可以提高水文模拟的准确性，因为与之前的产品相比，准确性有了显著提升。这种方法已在不同的时间和空间尺度上进行了验证，导致了更好的模拟结果，具有更低的相对偏差和更高的效率系数。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure how the accuracy of a new precipitation dataset is rigorously validated at different temporal and spatial scales.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定如何在不同的时间和空间尺度上严格验证一个新的降水数据集的准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The accuracy is validated by comparing the new dataset's precipitation observations with gauge observations across different temporal scales, such as extreme events and long-term trends, and spatial scales, including point and basin scales, to ensure improved accuracy.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 通过将新数据集的降水观测与不同时间尺度（如极端事件和长期趋势）以及不同空间尺度（包括点和流域尺度）的雨量计观测进行比较，验证了准确性，以确保提高准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand why extreme precipitation events are difficult to represent accurately in precipitation datasets.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白为什么极端降水事件在降水数据集中难以准确表示。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Extreme precipitation events are challenging to represent accurately because the existing datasets often lack the resolution or calibration necessary to capture these events precisely, which is compounded by the complex topography and sparse data distribution in the region.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 极端降水事件的准确表示具有挑战性，因为现有的数据集往往缺乏捕捉这些事件所需的分辨率或校准，这在复杂的地形和区域内稀疏的数据分布的影响下更加复杂。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify and evaluate the challenges faced in the data collection process for hydrological simulations and climate change studies in the upper Brahmaputra River basin.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别和评估在上布rahmaputra河流域进行水文模拟和气候变化研究的数据收集过程中面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include sparse observational data due to harsh environments and complex topography, limited gauge calibration, and irregular distribution of meteorological stations. There are large data constraints due to insufficient observations and indirect data sources. Furthermore, existing products do not accurately represent extreme precipitation events, necessitating improvements in capturing these events.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括由于恶劣环境和复杂地形导致的稀疏观测数据、有限的测站校准以及气象站的不规则分布。由于观测不足和间接数据源，数据约束很大。此外，现有产品无法准确表示极端降水事件，需要在捕捉这些事件方面进行改进。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please suggest methodologies for improving the accuracy of precipitation datasets used in hydrological and climate change studies in complex topographical regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请建议在复杂地形区域中提高用于水文和气候变化研究的降水数据集准确性的 methodologies。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Methodologies include integrating multiple datasets (gauge, satellite, reanalysis) and performing rigorous validation at various scales. This approach helps in capturing extreme events and improving the accuracy of basin-wide precipitation data. It is vital to address indirect observations and sparse gauge calibration to overcome uncertainties in complex topographical regions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 方法论包括整合多个数据集（雨量计、卫星、再分析）并在不同尺度上进行严格验证。这种方法有助于捕捉极端事件并提高流域降水数据的准确性。解决间接观测和稀疏雨量计校准的问题对于克服复杂地形区域的不确定性至关重要。
